Question: What are the names of all players who were part of the Brazilian squad in the 2014 World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Brazil"})-[:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2014}),
      (player:Person)-[:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[:FOR]->(tournament),
      (team)-[:NAMED]->(squad)
RETURN player, team, squad, tournament, player.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Brazil"})-[relation4:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2014}),
      (player:Person)-[relation5:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[relation6:FOR]->(tournament),
      (team)-[relation7:NAMED]->(squad)
RETURN relation7, relation6, relation5, relation4, player, team, squad, tournament, player.name
Rewrite: Can you list all the players who were included in the Brazilian team for the 2014 World Cup?

Question: What is the date of birth of each player who scored in the final of the 2018 World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match), 
      (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2018 AND match.stage="final"
RETURN player, scored, match, in_tournament, tournament, player.dob
Rewrite: For each player who scored during the 2018 World Cup final, what are their dates of birth?

Question: Which teams played in the semi-finals of the 2002 World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2002 AND match.stage="semi-finals"
RETURN team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, team.name
Rewrite: Which teams were the semi-finalists in the 2002 World Cup?

Question: What are the match stages and dates for matches where Germany scored more than 3 goals?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Germany"})-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]-(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE played_in.score > 3
RETURN team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, match.stage, match.date
Rewrite: What are the stages and dates of the games in which Germany scored over 3 goals?

Question: List all tournaments where 'Lionel Messi' has participated.
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person {name:"Lionel Messi"})-[:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)
RETURN player, team, participated, tournament, tournament.name, tournament.shortName, tournament.year
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person {name:"Lionel Messi"})-[relation3:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)
RETURN relation3, player, team, participated, tournament, tournament.name, tournament.shortName, tournament.year
Rewrite: Provide a list of all tournaments in which 'Lionel Messi' has competed.

Question: Which players from the England team participated in both the 2010 and 2014 World Cups?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"England"})-[:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[:PLAYED_IN]-(match2010:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(tournament2010:Tournament {year: 2010}),
      (player)-[:PLAYED_IN]-(match2014:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(tournament2014:Tournament {year: 2014})
RETURN player, team, match2010, match2014, tournament2010, tournament2014, player.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"England"})-[relation6:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[relation7:PLAYED_IN]-(match2010:Match)-[relation8:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(tournament2010:Tournament {year: 2010}),
      (player)-[relation9:PLAYED_IN]-(match2014:Match)-[relation10:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(tournament2014:Tournament {year: 2014})
RETURN relation10, relation9, relation8, relation7, relation6, player, team, match2010, match2014, tournament2010, tournament2014, player.name
Rewrite: Which members of the England squad took part in both the 2010 and 2014 World Cups?

Question: What minute did 'Eden Hazard' score his goal during the Belgium vs. Mexico match in 2018?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person {name:"Eden Hazard"})-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match),
      (team1:Team {name:"Belgium"})-[:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2018}),
      (team2:Team {name:"Mexico"})-[:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament),
      (match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament),
      (team1)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match),
      (team2)-[:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
RETURN player, scored_goal, match, team1, team2, tournament, played_in, scored_goal.minute
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person {name:"Eden Hazard"})-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match),
      (team1:Team {name:"Belgium"})-[relation6:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2018}),
      (team2:Team {name:"Mexico"})-[relation7:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament),
      (match)-[relation8:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament),
      (team1)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match),
      (team2)-[relation10:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
RETURN relation10, relation8, relation7, relation6, player, scored_goal, match, team1, team2, tournament, played_in, scored_goal.minute
Semantic-EQL-Question: What were the minutes in which Eden Hazard scored goals during the matches between Belgium and Mexico in the 2018 tournament?
Rewrite: During the 2018 Belgium vs. Mexico match, at what time did 'Eden Hazard' score his goal?

Question: Which coaches were named for squads that played in at least two consecutive World Cups?
Cypher:
MATCH (coach:Person)-[:COACH_FOR]->(squad:Squad)-[:FOR]->(tournament1:Tournament),
      (squad)-[:FOR]->(tournament2:Tournament)
WHERE tournament1.year = tournament2.year - 4
RETURN coach, squad, tournament1, tournament2, coach.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (coach:Person)-[relation4:COACH_FOR]->(squad:Squad)-[relation5:FOR]->(tournament1:Tournament),
      (squad)-[relation6:FOR]->(tournament2:Tournament)
WHERE tournament1.year = tournament2.year - 4
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, coach, squad, tournament1, tournament2, coach.name
Rewrite: Which coaches were appointed for teams that participated in at least two successive World Cups?

Question: What type of goal (penalty, normal) did 'Harry Kane' score in the quarter-finals of the 2018 World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person {name: "Harry Kane"})-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE match.stage="quarter-finals" AND tournament.year=2018
RETURN player, scored_goal, match, in_tournament, tournament, scored_goal.type

Question: How many matches involving 'France' were played in the 'Group Stage' of the 2014 World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"France"})-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE match.stage="Group Stage" AND tournament.year=2014
RETURN team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, count(match)
Rewrite: How many games did 'France' play in the 'Group Stage' of the 2014 World Cup?

Question: Which type of match (knockout or group) did 'Spain' play when they faced 'Italy' in 2012?
Cypher:
MATCH (teamSpain:Team {name:"Spain"})-[playedInSpain:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)<-[playedInItaly:PLAYED_IN]-(teamItaly:Team {name:"Italy"}),
      (match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2012})
RETURN teamSpain, playedInSpain, match, playedInItaly, teamItaly, inTournament, tournament, match.stage
Rewrite: In 2012, when 'Spain' competed against 'Italy', was it a knockout or group stage match?

Question: What were the scores attributed to 'Neymar' in all his World Cup matches?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person {name:"Neymar"})-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)
RETURN player, played_in, match, played_in.score
Rewrite: What were the ratings given to 'Neymar' in each of his World Cup games?

Question: How many different tournaments has 'Cristiano Ronaldo' scored in?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE player.name="Cristiano Ronaldo"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT tournament)
Rewrite: In how many distinct tournaments has 'Cristiano Ronaldo' made a goal?

Question: What is the average number of goals per match for 'Germany' in World Cup tournaments?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament),
      (player:Person)-[:REPRESENTS]->(team),
      (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE team.name="Germany" AND tournament.name CONTAINS "World Cup"
RETURN AVG(scored.minute) AS averageGoalsPerMatch
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[relation4:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament),
      (player:Person)-[relation5:REPRESENTS]->(team),
      (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation7:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE team.name="Germany" AND tournament.name CONTAINS "World Cup"
RETURN AVG(scored.minute) AS averageGoalsPerMatch
Rewrite: What is the mean count of goals per game for 'Germany' in World Cup competitions?

Question: What is the maximum number of goals scored by a single player in the quarter-final stage throughout all World Cups?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
WHERE match.stage="quarter-final"
RETURN player.name, COUNT(scored) AS goals
ORDER BY goals DESC
LIMIT 1
Rewrite: What's the highest goal count by an individual player during the quarter-finals in all World Cup tournaments?

Question: Count the number of assists made by players from 'Argentina' in the 2018 tournament.
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)
WHERE team.name="Argentina"
MATCH (player)-[:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2018
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT match)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)
WHERE team.name="Argentina"
MATCH (player)-[relation5:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation6:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2018
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT match)
Rewrite: Calculate how many assists were delivered by 'Argentina' players during the 2018 tournament.

Question: What is the total number of players who have played in both the 2010 and 2014 World Cups?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[:PLAYED_IN]->(:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament2010:Tournament)
WHERE tournament2010.year = 2010
WITH player
MATCH (player)-[:PLAYED_IN]->(:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament2014:Tournament)
WHERE tournament2014.year = 2014
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT player)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[relation5:PLAYED_IN]->(node1:Match)-[relation8:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament2010:Tournament)
WHERE tournament2010.year = 2010
WITH player
MATCH (player)-[relation6:PLAYED_IN]->(node3:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament2014:Tournament)
WHERE tournament2014.year = 2014
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT player)
Rewrite: How many players participated in both the 2010 and 2014 World Cups?

Question: How many teams have won the World Cup more than once?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.shortName CONTAINS "World Cup"
WITH team, COUNT(DISTINCT tournament) AS wins
WHERE wins > 1
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT team)
Rewrite: How many teams have claimed the World Cup title multiple times?
